title: The Emerald Isle Princess And The Silver Tiara
description: A lost silver tiara may not be so plain after all, as thirteen year old Morgan finds that magic indeed exists!Who is the real Emerald Isle Princess?Will Morgan ever meet her prince in the enchated kingdom? Or will she be miserable in her dungeon back home, looking after her four year old brother Johnny in her own realm? Magic, mystery and an adventure awaits in the Emerald Isle Kingdom.
author: Beverly Banfield
